name: Microwave Chicken Pie Plates with Veg and Warm Garlic Baguette
description: Family-friendly chicken pies heated in minutes, served with microwavable mixed vegetables and warm garlic baguette. Zero chili heat and minimal prep for a fast weeknight dinner.
prep_steps: Read heating instructions on the chicken pie, mixed vegetables, and garlic baguette packages.
Place chicken pie trays on a microwave-safe plate and pierce film if required.
Transfer mixed vegetables to a microwave-safe bowl and cover.
Slice the garlic baguette if not pre-sliced and place on a microwave-safe plate.
Have gravy and salt and pepper ready.
cook_steps: Microwave chicken pie according to pack directions (typically 4–6 minutes per pie, heating in batches if needed) until hot in the center.
Microwave mixed vegetables 3–5 minutes, stirring halfway, until hot and tender.
Microwave garlic baguette 1–2 minutes until warm (or bake in a preheated oven per pack for a crisper result).
Warm gravy in the microwave in a microwave-safe jug 60–90 seconds, stirring once.
Plate one chicken pie per person, add a scoop of vegetables, and serve with warm garlic baguette. Add gravy and a pinch of salt and pepper to taste.
